mapper.select: select srr.*,sdl.status from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl where srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and sdl.user_delete = 1 and srr.repairman = #{id} order by srr.create_date DESC

select sdld.code,srr.repair_date as order_date,sdld.type,su1.actual_name as operator_name,su2.actual_name as distributor_name from sys_report_repair as srr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl,sys_dispatch_list_detail as sdld,sys_user as su1,sys_user as su2 where srr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdld.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdld.operator = su1.id and sdld.create_id = su2.id and sdl.user_delete =1 and sdl.sys_delete =1 and srr.repairman = #{id} and srr.id = #{repairId}
select * from sys_process_record as spr,sys_dispatch_list as sdl where spr.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdl.user_delete = 1 and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and spr.dispatch_list_id = #{repairId}
select * from sys_handle_complete_detail as shcd,sys_dispatch_list as sdl where shcd.dispatch_list_id = sdl.id and sdl.user_delete = 1 and sdl.sys_delete = 1 and shcd.dispatch_list_id = #{repairId}
mapper.update: update sys_dispatch_list set user_delete = 0 where id = (select dispatch_list_id from sys_report_repair where id = #{repairId} and repairman = #{id})
update sys_dispatch_list set status = 8 where id = (select dispatch_list_id from sys_report_repair where id = #{repairId} and repairman = #{id})
mapper.select: select dispatch_list_id from sys_report_repair where repairman = #{id} and id = #{repairId}
mapper.update: update sys_dispatch_list set status = 5 where id = (select dispatch_list_id from sys_report_repair where id = #{repairId} and repairman = #{id})
mapper.select: select repairman from sys_report_repair where id = #{repairId}
select (maintenance_labor_cast+maintenance_material_cost) as payPrice from sys_report_repair where id = #{reportRepairId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_report_repair_order( report_repair_id, code, name, tel, pay_type, pay_price, create_id, create_date, status )values ( #{reportRepairId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{payType}, #{payPrice}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update sys_report_repair_order set status = #{status} where code = #{code}
